mapper.select: SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID employeeId, BIRTH_DATE birthDate, PHOTO photo, NOTES notes, NAME name, MANAGER manager FROM EMPLOYEES
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CUSTOMERS (CUSTOMER_ID, CUSTOMER_NAME, PASSWORD, ADDRESS, CITY, POSTAL_CODE, SSN, PHOTO, PHONE) VALUES (#{customerId}, #{customerName}, #{password}, #{address}, #{city}, #{postalCode}, #{ssn}, #{photo}, #{phone})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM CUSTOMERS WHERE CUSTOMER_ID LIKE #{customerId}
